name: Coots Stream Dreams
description:
WARNING - The WebGL / Browser version of the game is ass. Disable audio for a smoother experience. Please download the windows version for the authentic experience.

CONTROLS

Left/Right Mouse Button - Click

DESCRIPTION

Coots seems to be having a lil nappy time, dreaming about being just like her dad. Can you get to level 30 and become the greatest streamer of all time?!
..Or perhaps go for a highscore in the endless mode!

FAMOUS COMMENTS

"This is just like wario-ware" - Me         "That was fire / Def my number 1" - Dancorona

"This game is amazing" - Ludwig (probably)

"I'm in love with this game" - Your mom
